name: Quicksilver Ventures
overview:
Our strategy is to leverage our combined experience in operations, corporate management, and venture capital to identify great investment opportunities in the ever-changing world of computing and consumer technology, and then to assist those companies in our portfolio to grow and attain their goals.

The areas of particular interest to us include, but are not limited to:

Video and Imaging

The video and imaging technologies that form the foundation of the next generation of displays and televisions, as well as cameras, cell phone handsets, and other portable devices.

Networking and Mobility

The technologies and systems that help information and communication flow efficiently across distances large and small, including fixed and wireless forms of voice, data, and storage networking.

Data Management, Services and Security

The hardware, software and services that facilitate deploying, managing, and protecting, both large and small, computing and storage systems.

Storage Components and Systems

The components, software, and systems that provide data storage capabilities.

Enterprise Applications

The software applications that drive and support enterprise businesses.
